Transformations¶

Variational Auto-encoder¶

Variational Auto-encoders (VAEs) are popular generative models being used in many domains.

Traditional Derivation of a VAE¶

We assume some process that generate the data, such as a latent variable generative model.

We can formalize as follows:

  1. Sample latent representation from some prior distribution

  2. Based on the sample, create the actual representation , modelled itself as a stochastic process

Objective Function: Evidence Lower BOund (ELBO)¶

The objective function is to maximize the ELBO of .

where

  • is the prior on the latent representation

  • is the variational encoder

  • is the decoder: how likely is the input given the latent representation
